column4: Does anyone have any idea what would cause my X-server to restart, my password to be change, and different login screen pop up while I am shutting down that has a blue background and a yellow flower on it pop up?
fwik, that is the default gnome login page,  does this happen after a fresh restart?
if your password is easy, you could run john the ripper on your passwords file...
I am mostly just concerned because something caused my Xserver to crash and when I tried to log back in my password didnt work.
